name: A Witch And A Ghost
description:
You, a witch elf, have noticed some strange events happening inside your house and when you use a spell, you discover a ghost in your house.

Created for the O2A2 Jam 2021!

FEATURES:
  • 979 words of text
  • three endings, including two bad and one good ending.
  • custom character and background art
  • A fantasy story about a witch and a ghost who are both elves.

!! includes endings where you die !!

CREDITS:
  • Story and coding by FairyKelly
  • Character art by Yakuchi
  • Background by Anastasiyastoly
  • Music by Eric Matyas
